content: kay litton -- not for commercial use for help or questions please email kay at crazysockladydesigns@gmail com 4 large 72 st round 1 p1 k4 p4 4 times k3 knit rest of round round 2 p2 k4 p4 4 times k2 knit rest of round round 3 p3 k4 p4 4 times k1 knit rest of round round 4 p4 k4 p4 4 times knit rest of round round 5 k1 p4 k4 4 times p3 knit rest of round round 6 k2 p4 k4 4 times p2 knit rest of round round 7 k3 p4 k4 4 times p1 knit rest of round round 8 k4 p4 4 times p4 knit rest of round repeat row 1-8 of the pattern for your size 7 more times for a total of 64 rounds on your very last pattern repeat row work in pattern across the instep and then start the heel fap **if you wish to do a shorter or longer leg that is perfectly fine just do the length you prefer remembering to mark which row you ended on so that you can pick up with the pattern after you finish the heel flap and turn slip_stitch heel flap your heel flap will be worked flat across half of your total stitches 28 32 36 *make sure that you are working this on the back of the sock row 1 *sl 1 k1* repeat across row row 2 sl 1 with yarn in front purl across row repeat these two row a total of 14 16 18 times this will give you a total of 28 32 36 row wyatt s socks -- crazy sock lady designs -- kay litton -- not for commercial use for help or questions please email kay at crazysockladydesigns@gmail com 5 heel turn row 1 sl 1 k 14 16 18 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl 1 with yarn in front p 3 p2tog p1 turn row 3 s1 1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl 1 with yarn in front p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn *do not sl first stitch on very last purl row you will purl it repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches on the heel have been worked you will end with a wrong side row and have 16 18 20 sts left now it is time to pick up gusset stitches gusset k across the first 8 9 10 stitches of the heel turn and place a marker this will now be the beginning of your round k across the last 8 9 10 stitches of the heel turn and then pick up 14 16 18 stitches along the side of the heel flap pick up 1 extra stitch in the ladder in the row below k across the instep stitches front of the sock being sure to stay in pattern pick up 1 extra stitch in the ladder in the row below pick up 14
